original_text: This is how the lampstand was made: It was made of hammered gold—from its base to its blossoms. The lampstand was made exactly like the pattern the Lord had shown Moses.
korean_text: 이 등잔대의 제작법은 이러하니 곧 금을 쳐서 만든 것인데 밑판에서 그 꽃까지 쳐서 만든 것이라 모세가 여호와께서 자기에게 보이신 양식을 따라 이 등잔대를 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: This is how the lampstand was made:
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 어떻게 그 등잔대가 만들어졌는지에 대한 설명입니다:

sentences.original_text: It was made of hammered gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 망치로 두드려 만든 금으로 만들어졌습니다

sentences.original_text: from its base to its blossoms.
The lampstand was made exactly like the pattern

sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 모세에게 보여주신 그 패턴과 똑같이
